string.text: Meet with Dusk
Dusk should be in his office.
Meet Dusk
I should go talk to Dusk.
I got a mission for any sucker wanting some overtime.
Know any leaders that might be willing to help out?
Yes, theres a few, heres one for you.
Hey, I'm here for that mission
Really? are you sure new guy? It's nothing like back at the facility.
So, what's this important mission about?

We got word of some legend talking about a stalker named strelok. They say he's got knowledge about the zone that nobody else knows about. We want you to find this strelok and extract as much information you can from him.
Now that sounds like a solid mission.
I change my mind.
Yes, however, it won't be that easy. We have no idea where he is but we have word that an old friend of streloks has been spotted in the swamp.
I'll take the mission.
I like your spirit. Go find Strelok's old friend, goes by Doctor. Here's a PDA with the Doctor's coordinates. DON'T lose it, got it? If I see you dead without it, I'm killing you again, kapeesh?.
Mission accomplished.
You made it, huh? I knew you're a tough cookie. Okay, tell me what you've got.

Aside from nightmare material for several years? I accompanied Strelok and his men on their quest into the Sarcophagus. In the meantime, I discovered quite a lot about the Zone. Found some top secret documents in clandestine labs. Strelok took them, but he told me a lot. And gave me this pendrive. It contains a few dozen encrypted gigabytes of info about the Zone's dirty little secrets.
That's definitely something I can work with. Good job. Our client'll know what to do with this.
Uhm, can we trust our client with all that info?

Trust? What are you talking about? Don't worry, we aren't selling this to any dictator or anything. We'd all like to earn some money but without blowing up the planet in the process, right? Speaking of money, you deserve a reward. If you get any nightmares, just use the money as a pillow. It should help.
What would someone like you want with strelok?
I just want information, nothing more.
Yes. I wasn't expecting Rogue to recruit anyone.
You've come with Rogue? That guy doesn't make friends easily, especially with soldiers. Although, you have something about you..
Ask Smith about what he knows about the Zone.
Smith might know more about the Zone.
Hey, Smith. I've been following the trail of a stalker named Strelok. He's headed north. Any ideas how can I get there?

Huh? Ah, right. Strelok. I recognise that name. Guy knows the Zone like the back of his hand. He's got quite a few achievements to his credit, too. Anyway, you wanna go north? You're finally ready to bid farewell to this cruel world?
Come on, I can manage just fine. Just tell me what'd be the best course of action.

The best? Don't go there. The second best? I suppose you should visit the eggheads in Yantar and get some device to shield you from the psy-field. Then, talk with Gatekeeper. The bastard eats Monolith fanatics for breakfast. He helps hold the Barrier and repeatedly fends off their southward incursions. Radar is the only semi-sensible route you'd want to take if you wish to go north. But be prepared for packs of vicious mutants, labyrinthine anomalies, extreme radiation levels, and well-armed Monolith soldiers guarding the way.
Doesn't sound great, but I don't intend to abandon my mission.
That's your choice, of course. Some adventurous stalkers do make it now and then. No pain, no gain... as the kids say. Anyway, Gatekeeper will know more about this, so he's your next stop.
Thanks, Smith. I'll be going now.
No problem. Good Luck rookie.
